    • Constructor Detail

      • Operator

        public Operator(Geometry geometry,
        boolean useBoundaries)
        Construct an n x n matrix and populate it according to the connectivity of the geometry.
        Parameters:
        geometry - -- the geometry upon which to base the operator.
        useBoundaries - -- utilize boundary conditions in constructing the operator. WARNING: disabling boundary conditions can lead to illegal coordinate indices!
